content:
In rustc_codegen_llvm/src/debuginfo/metadata.rs there is this line: 

/// A map from types to `UniqueTypeId`. This is an N:1 mapping.
type_to_unique_id: FxHashMap<Ty<'tcx>, UniqueTypeId>

Is this relationship N:1 in the sense that N variables can consist of 1 data type? On a related note, does this imply that a unique Ty.kind has a similar N:1 relationship with N variables?
